text:
@realDonaldTrump Why didn’t you authorize the Federal Government to do something serious about stopping the Covid19 instead of supporting these slave generals from old days
You are on the wrong track as always.
120,000 deaths and 40 million unemployed.
Disaster because of the narcissist in the WH https://t.co/z1F5Kg4oXZ
